Comments_List: I learned the theory of linear modeling in the aspect of visualization. It's easier for me to understand the formulas in that way.
presentation and visualization of linear models
Visualization of linear model.

I developed sound foundation in linear models, which definitely helped me understand statistics more deeply. Th final projects helped us expand our knowledge and practice in the field that we are interested.
Basic knowledge of developing linear model and its background logic.
data visualization

Uclidian explaination or linear regression. Visualization of variables
Evaluate my sense of multi-dimension space
The  principle and concepts of probability theory.

Graphical understanding of data and statistics. Along with important concepts about  linear based view points. The course was one of my favorite and really exciting class. Especially through final project, I learned many different utilities and related topics to the materials from class.
Developed theoretical knowledge on linear models.
basic theory behind linear models and how to apply it in practice

Dr. Brinda taught us the theory of linear modeling by visualization, which is fantastic. And he used the second half part of the course to let us do presentations on extended fields. I hope this course could cover more topics in details.
In the second half semester,  there is less knowledge passed on in the class compared to the first half.

This course is awesome. Professor Brinda's book of linear model really changed my understanding of statistics. The first half of the course was about basic knowledge of linear models, and during the second half students do presentations about their final projects. He had appointments with all the student to discuss about our final projects which was really helpful. I really wish professor Brinda could teach more about the proposed topics and cut the time of student presentation to half.

Strength: It provided a novel perspective to learn linear model. It is really helpful for learning statistics.

Weakness: More knowledge related to linear model should be covered, like linear mixed model.

Strength: very integrated and concentrated material. Very good illustration and teaching. Contents are interesting. 

Weakness: No answer for homework. No class note available after class. Lack of teaching in R programming

The course was well planned and taught, divided into intuitive 3 lessons. I learned the great deal due to challenging problem sets and exam. Moreover, the final project really allowed me to understand and apply the materials we learned in class.
Improved theoretical basis on linear modeling
great instructor but the student presentations were not very effective
Yes, especially for those who are new to this field. Because it's very easy to understand the theory by visualization.
Highly recommend
Yes. This course has a new perspective
Yes, professor Brinda teaches really well. The best foundation course of statistics I've ever had, which also prepared students to many harder statistics topics.
Yes
Yes! The teacher taught clearly and was enthusiastic.
Need strong background in linear algebra
Yes! This course is very helpful in understanding the background of linear regression. I learned a much clearer picture of regression. The instructor is also very helpful and nice

This is a great course to take if the student is planning to deal with data and statistics. It can really challenge the student to think with new perspective and grow in understanding. I recommend the class.
Yes
yes it was a good class and I learned a lot
